title: Talent Scout
desc:
Post 2163
- For 3 turns, somebody secretly becomes the Talent they are informed.
- While the Talent exists. You cannot play cards that affect everybody.
- After 3 turns, if you play a card that affects the Talent, you discard 2 cards.
- After 3 turns, if you have not, you draw 4 cards. One of them has to be <:black:1106265022453268530>.
